job_purpose: Join Binary IT Pty Ltd as a Software Engineer to lead Java software development projects, conduct requirement analysis, and provide post-sale technical support.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Architect, design, and code Java software projects
Research new technologies and improve project frameworks
Conduct requirement analysis and prototype design
Lead a small team to project completion
Write program modules and algorithms for electricity meters
Conduct comprehensive testing, debugging, and modification of software faults
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electronic Information, Automation, or related fields
Minimum 10 years of software development experience
Proficiency in Java software design and development
Skilled in programming with C language
Proficient in Microsoft Office, WPS, and other document processing software
company_name: Binary IT Pty Ltd - T/A NSW IT Support
company_details: Binary IT Pty Ltd is a trusted managed IT services provider based in Homebush West, Sydney. They specialize in tailored cybersecurity and procurement solutions for clients in education, healthcare, and legal services.
